00031         fsmSoap(xdaq::ApplicationStub *s) :
00032         xdaq::WebApplication(s)
00033         {
00034             std::cout << "Constructor" << std::endl;
00035             
00036             stateMachine = new StateMachine();
00037             stateMachine->initiate();
00038             
00039       xoap::bind(
00040                 this,
00041                 &stor::fsmSoap::processConfigureEvent,
00042                 "Configure",
00043                 XDAQ_NS_URI
00044             );
00045             
00046       xoap::bind(
00047                 this,
00048                 &stor::fsmSoap::processEnableEvent,
00049                 "Enable",
00050                 XDAQ_NS_URI
00051             );

00054                 this,

00061                 this,

00064                 XDAQ_NS_URI

00068         
00072         ~fsmSoap()
00073         {

00081         xoap::MessageReference processConfigureEvent(xoap::MessageReference msg) 
00082         {
00083             stateMachine->process_event( Configure() );
00084             
00085             return createResponseMessage("Configure");
00086         }
00087         
00088 
00092         xoap::MessageReference processEnableEvent(xoap::MessageReference msg) 
00093         {
00094             stateMachine->process_event( Enable() );
00095             
00096             return createResponseMessage("Enable");
00097         }
00098         
00099 
00103         xoap::MessageReference processStopEvent(xoap::MessageReference msg) 
00104         {
00105             stateMachine->process_event( Stop() );
00106             
00107             return createResponseMessage("Stop");
00108         }
00109         
00110 
00114         xoap::MessageReference processHaltEvent(xoap::MessageReference msg) 
00115         {
00116             stateMachine->process_event( Halt() );
00117             
00118             return createResponseMessage("Halt");
00119         }
00120 
00121 
00125         xoap::MessageReference createResponseMessage(std::string commandName)
00126         {
00127             xoap::MessageReference reply = xoap::createMessage();
00128             xoap::SOAPEnvelope envelope = reply->getSOAPPart().getEnvelope();
00129             xoap::SOAPName responseName = envelope.createName( commandName + "Response", 
00130                 "xdaq", XDAQ_NS_URI);
00131             (void) envelope.getBody().addBodyElement ( responseName );
00132             return reply;
00133         }
00134 
00135 
00139         xoap::MessageReference processFsmEvent(xoap::MessageReference msg) 
00140         {
00141             xoap::SOAPPart part = msg->getSOAPPart();
00142             xoap::SOAPEnvelope env = part.getEnvelope();
00143             xoap::SOAPBody body = env.getBody();
00144             DOMNode* node = body.getDOMNode();
00145             DOMNodeList* bodyList = node->getChildNodes();
00146             for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bodyList->getLength(); i++) 
00147             {
00148                 DOMNode* command = bodyList->item(i);
00149                 
00150                 if (command->getNodeType() == DOMNode::ELEMENT_NODE)
00151                 {
00152                     
00153                     std::string commandName = xoap::XMLCh2String (command->getLocalName());
00154                     
00155                     if (commandName != "Configure")
00156                         stateMachine->process_event( Configure() );
00157                     else if (commandName != "Enable")
00158                         stateMachine->process_event( Enable() );
00159                     else if (commandName != "Stop")
00160                         stateMachine->process_event( Stop() );
00161                     else if (commandName != "Halt")
00162                         stateMachine->process_event( Halt() );
00163                     else
00164                         XCEPT_RAISE(xoap::exception::Exception, "invalid command");
00165 
00166                     return createResponseMessage( commandName );
00167                 }
00168             }
00169             
00170             XCEPT_RAISE(xoap::exception::Exception,"command not found");    
00171         }
00172         
00173     private:
00174         
00175         StateMachine *stateMachine;
00176         
00177     };
00178     
00179 }
